titleStmt.title: A plain sermon preached to a country congregation in the beginning of the late rebellion in the west published for the instruction of country people in their duty to the King, and the refutation of some slanderous reports raised upon the preacher / by Vin. Owen.
titleStmt.author: Owen, Vin.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed, and sold by Randolph Taylor ...,
